# Time Series Analysis
In this exercise, we perform time series analysis of BTC-USD data, downloaded from Kaggle: https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/prasoonkottarathil/btcinusd. 

```{r loading libraries, include=FALSE}
library(tseries)
library(forecast)
library(readr)
```

```{r load data, include=FALSE}
df <- read_csv('BTC-Daily.csv')
head(df)
str(df)
```
